channel.title: How to make a person in-game admin?
channel.description:
Does anyone know the code to use a command i.e ::makeadmin (playername)
So that i could make someone an admin without going through 100's of files and it could just kick the player and when he logs back in he is an admin.
Thank You For Noticing This Post & If you reply thank you so much

item.title: How to make a person in-game admin?
item.dc:creator: @xx_robie_xx xx robie xx
item.description:
@xx_robie_xx wrote:

holy dang did u put it on the right spot?

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a person in-game admin?

item.source: How to make a person in-game admin?

item.title: How to make a person in-game admin?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.source: How to make a person in-game admin?

item.title: How to make a person in-game admin?
item.dc:creator: @_mnchmn2 ~mnchmn2~
item.description:
@_mnchmn2 wrote:

dont forget demote

[code=xml]else if (command.startsWith(“demote”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(7);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 0;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            c.disconnected = true;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name
                    + " is no longer a member of staff");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }
    }[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a person in-game admin?

item.title: How to make a person in-game admin?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

lol :P[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 10, 2008, 02:00:52 PM[/size][hr]} else if(command.startsWith(“givemod”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“tom”)) {
String name = command.substring(8);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 1;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(name+" is now a Moderator");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}

thats for mod

} else if(command.startsWith(“makeowner”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“tom”)) {
String name = command.substring(10);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 3;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}

thats owner

hope this helped

Read full topic

item.source: How to make a person in-game admin?

item.title: How to make a person in-game admin?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

try this

if(command.startsWith(“giveadmin”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“tom”)) {
String name = command.substring(10);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 2;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(name+“koes u he is the new member of tomscape team!!ftw! ownz! gratz him now!!lol!!!”);
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}

Read full topic
